row.join_message:
Welcome to the %LIST_NAME_LONG% mailing list.
To send a message to the list: mailto:%LIST_EMAIL_ADDRESS% To leave the list mailto:%LIST_EMAIL_ADDRESS%?subject=leave
If you have a problem with the list, you can contact me directly on mailto:%LIST_MASTER_EMAIL_ADDRESS%
Please note, the list does not currently accept attachments and the message size limit is %MESSAGE_SIZE_LIMIT%kb
We all look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
%LIST_MASTER_NAME%.
row.leave_message:
Thank you for being a member of the %LIST_NAME_LONG% mailing list.
To re-join the list, send a message to: mailto:%LIST_EMAIL_ADDRESS%?subject=join
Hope to hear from you again.
Rgs,
%LIST_MASTER_NAME%.
row.reject_message_size_message:
Sorry, we where not able to send you message onto the list members because it is too big.
You can send messages up to %MESSAGE_SIZE_LIMIT%kb in size.
Please send the message again with the text reduced.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
row.non_list_member_message:
Sorry, you are not currently a member of the %LIST_NAME_LONG% mailing list and you post to the list has been rejected.
If you would like to join the list, please send a message to mailto:%LIST_EMAIL_ADDRESS%?subject=join
Once again, we apologise for the inconvenience and hope you will understand that this is the best way to keep the list membership up to date.
We look forward from hearing from you again.
Rgs,
%LIST_MASTER_NAME%.
row.reject_attachment_message:
Sorry, you are not able to send a message with an attachment to this list.
Please send the message again without the attachment.
You will ofter find that only a few list members will be wanting to receive an attachment. The way around this is to send a message asking for members who want the attachment to respond directly to you. You can then send the attachment straight to them.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
%LIST_MASTER_NAME%.
row.footer_message: To send a message to the list mailto:%LIST_EMAIL_ADDRESS%?body=your_message To leave the list mailto:%LIST_EMAIL_ADDRESS%?subject=leave
